div.div: Saint John's Univ. vs. Augsburg College
at Minneapolis, Minn. | Edor Nelson Field

tr.td: SJU wins toss, defers; Augsburg to receive and defend west end.
Zach Barwick kickoff 52 yards to the AUG13, Isiah Malone return 11 yards to the AUG24 (Jake Engelken).
Tiras Bolton rush for 2 yards to the AUG26 (T. Dittberner; Carter Hanson).
Sam Keis pass incomplete to James Newton.
Sam Keis sacked for loss of 5 yards to the AUG21 (Nathan Brinker).
Glenn Meyers punt 33 yards to the SJU46, Max Jackson return 0 yards to the SJU46 (Jacob Bom).
Saint John's Univ. drive start at 13:27.
Ben Alvord pass complete to Evan Clark for 54 yards to the AUG00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 13:17.

Sam Keis sacked for loss of 11 yards to the AUG15 (Ted Kalina).
